history.proof: intros A B R HA H. pose proof (finite_dep_choice _ _ _ HA H) as Hf. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros A B R HA H.
pose proof (finite_dep_choice _ _ _ HA H) as Hf.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (bij_finite _ _ _ _ HA Hf) as Hy.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R : A -> B -> Prop HA : FiniteT A H : forall x : A, exists y : B, R x y Hf : exists f : forall x : A, (fun _ : A => B) x, forall x : A, R x (f x) The term "HA" has type "FiniteT A" while it is expected to have type "invertible ?f".

original: intros A B R HA H. pose proof (finite_dep_choice _ _ _ HA H) as Hf. pose proof (bij_finite _ _ _ _ HA Hf) as Hy. pose proof (ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on _ _ R Hy) as Hc. apply Hc.
